column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last week , I flew in an airplane to visit a different state .
#id=2
#text=After I parked my car in the parking lot , I found the right ticket counter for my airline and then turned in my suitcase so it could travel in the cargo of the plane .
#id=3
#text=Then I went to a place called a gate which is really just an indoor place to wait for my plane to arrive .
#id=4
#text=It has a big window where I watched the planes and waited for my turn to get on one .
#id=5
#text=Once my plane arrived , a nice flight attendant showed me to my seat and I sat down to wait .
#id=6
#text=My seat was comfortable , but small , and there were people sitting on each side of me .
#id=7
#text=Once everyone settled in , the plane started and then drove down the runway to wait its turn to take off .
#id=8
#text=When we took off , it rose into the air and then leveled off to what the pilot called cruising speed .
#id=9
#text=Then the flight attendants brought around food and drinks .
#text=The plane was a little noisy , but it was fun to watch the people and the food was pretty good .
#text=The plane ride was short and we had barely finished our food and drinks before the pilot said it was time to land in the next town .
#text=The flight attendants came back around to pick up our trash and then we had to buckle our seat belts again for the plane to land .
#text=It was a fun trip and I hope I get to do it again sometime .
